alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Medina (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:59PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Medina and western Bexar Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 658 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sea World, or 12 miles northeast of Castroville, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Castroville, Helotes, Fair Oaks Ranch, Cross Mountain, Lytle, Somerset, Lacoste, Cliff, Leon Springs, Noonan, Government Canyon State Natural Area, Pearson, Rio Medina, Sea World, Lackland AFB, Von Ormy, Grey Forest, Macdona and San Geronimo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
